column2: UPDATE 3-Millions of Target shoppers face new debit card limits NEW YORK
column3: Dec 21 At least 2 million shoppers who used bank debit cards at Target Corp stores during its recent data breach are facing lower limits on how much cash they can take out of teller machines and spend at stores. ~UPDATE 3-Target probe eyes overseas hackers; stolen cards for sale online WASHINGTON
